attributes.action: resign together with all cabinet ministers and MP's who voted to continue to exploit the public by claiming expenses without receipts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's who voted to retain the "John Lewis List" and claim expenses without receipts are confirming our worst suspicions about their greed and lack of integrity. One rule for them and another for hard working citizens of the UK shows that they are not fit to represent the British Public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
